heading: .gitignore tips
title: Ignore all files in a directory except a specific file
summary: How to ignore all files in a directory except for a specific one.

body.raw:
Keep 1 file and ignore others in a directory

`.gitignore`

```bash:.gitignore {5} showLineNumbers
# Ignore all file in a directory
directory/*

# Keep only this file
!directory/file-to-keep.ext
```
